description: before Joe Franko Fransisko Vs. W.M. Kapurubanda- Hon.A.H.M.D.Nawaz, J-Transfer of a case-Interpretation of the word "expedient" in Section46(1)(d) of Judicature Act-transfer be"beneficial not only for the Petitioner but also for all litigants"
judgement_by: Joe Franko Fransisko Vs. W.M. Kapurubanda- Hon.A.H.M.D.Nawaz, J-Transfer of a case-Interpretation of the word "expedient" in Section46(1)(d) of Judicature Act-transfer be"beneficial not only for the Petitioner but also for all litigants"
